original_text: and you shall make no covenant with the inhabitants of this land; you shall break down their altars.’ But you have not obeyed my voice. What is this you have done?
korean_text: 너희는 이 땅의 주민과 언약을 맺지 말며 그들의 제단들을 헐라 하였거늘 너희가 내 목소리를 듣지 아니하였으니 어찌하여 그리하였느냐

sentences.original_text: and you shall make no covenant
with the inhabitants of this land
you shall break down their altars
But you have not obeyed my voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 내 음성을 순종하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: What is this you have done
